short_summary: Divisional Psychologist wanted. Services needed for occupational health services. anticipated level of effort is forty hours and so forth
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the services of one physician to provide onsite care for the designated group.
full_summary:
### Tender Information

**Title**
Divisional Psychologist

**Reference Number**
PW-23-01022510

**Solicitation Number**
M5000-22-2571/A

**Publication Date**
2023-01-23

**Tender Closing Date**
2023-02-14T15:00:00

**Procurement Category**
SRV (Services)

**Procurement Method**
Competitive - Open bidding

**Trade Agreements**
NA (Not Applicable)

### Tender Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is inviting tenders for a Divisional Psychologist service in Manitoba, Canada. The successful contractor will provide onsite occupational health services to RCMP Members in ‘D’ Division, Manitoba.

**Scope of Work**

* Provide medical services for a minimum of 40 hours per week
* Operate within the site hours of 8:00 am to 18:00 pm, Monday to Friday

**Contract Details**

* Contract duration: 2 years, with an option to extend for up to 3 additional one-year periods
*idders must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation package to be considered responsive

**Security Clearance**

* All personnel working on site must hold a valid "Top Secret" Security Clearance issued by RCMP Departmental Security

### Additional Information

* Tenders must be submitted via email to [NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* Interested bidders should refer to the attached tender documents for further information
* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement
* Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations and related documents can be downloaded through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Simonson, Sheena
sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
306-515-1563

###Attachments

Refer to the attached tender documents, available in English and French.

### Notice URL

None. Please refer to the attached tender documents for further information. For notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations and related documents visit: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities)
